name: Week 1 - Pong
description:
Classic Pong!

This is the first week project in a 1GameAWeek Challenge. Each week I will be adding another small game made with in the confines of one week and deployed by Midnight (EST) on Sunday of the week.

I will be blogging about the experience on www.fatguyinahawaiianshirt.com.

CONTROLS :

Keyboard - W/S or Up/Down to move paddle.

Mouse - Click & Hold.
